revised_title: Adsorption, Oriented Overgrowth, and Mixed Crystal Formation: A Comprehensive Study
tldr: This article investigates the cause of strong adsorption of certain substances on specific crystal faces and its relation to oriented overgrowth and mixed crystal formation. The author suggests a theory of adsorption and examines the properties of modified crystals containing impurities. The study compares the properties of "adsorption bodies" and mixed crystals, providing evidence of the structure and orientation of impurities within the crystals.
